Title: War & Youth

Original Title: Sensou to seishun/War And Youth

Director: Tadashi Imai
Writer: Katsumoto Saotome
Genre: Drama/War
Language: Japanese
Country: Japan
Year: 1991


Plot

A contemporary Japanese schoolgirl tries to discover facts about the war from her father, whose memories are too painful for him to share. Then she learns about her mute aunt's dead child, who was lost during the Allied firebombing of Tokyo in 1945. The film then shifts to tell the story of the aunt, and how she loses her husband and child in the chaos of the air raids.
